data.name: Hazard Ops: Elite Merc Pack
data.detailed_description:
The ultimate elite pack for hard-core mercenaries. Nothing but the best for our elite! The contents of this pack will rock every battlefield. Not only will you look great, but you’ll also get an exclusive Steam weapon for free on top!

Six extremely awesome weapons, three of which are permanent, will give you the upper hand in any scenario, and they look incredibly bad-ass in action.

Exclusive for Steam players: The Sako M90 Steam Edition is a real beast in combat. It takes weapon design, craftsmanship, and power to new levels!

Just for our elite, we’ve also included a VIP card, giving you 30% more XP and 30% more Coins after every battle. Exclusive access to the VIP store and lots of buffs make the deal even sweeter.

Exclusive Steam Weapon

  • Sako M90 Steam Edition (permanent) – freebie

Weapons & Mods

  • Carbide Launcher (permanent)
  • Platinum HK416 (permanent)
  • Lightning Gun (7 days)
  • Arc Sword (permanent)
  • Big Time Ares Destroyer Box
  • Big Time X90-v Railgun Box
  • AR Reflex Scope (30 days)
  • AR High-Capacity Mag (30 days)

Outfits

  • Mech Pilot (M) (permanent)
  • Mech Pilot (F) (permanent)

Consumables

  • VIP Access (30 days)
  • 10x Grenade Turret
  • 10x Cyclone Turret
  • 10x Revive Token
  • 5x Key Card
  • 1x Difficulty Unlock
  • 1x Auto-Stim Boost

Join the elite now to get all the sweet benefits!

data.short_description: A little something for the elite: This ultimate all-in-one pack comes with a prime selection of unique weapons, 2 special costume sets, VIP access, and loads more – including an exclusive Steam weapon!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9800GT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel i-Series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT240 or newer (equals Radeon 3650 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
